name: Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia)
description: Fresh, floral aroma that gently supports relaxation and calm.
supports: Survivors of PTSD, C-PTSD, sexual assault, trafficking, domestic abuse, incarceration, foster care, systemic trauma, cultural trauma, racism, gender-based violence. Individuals diagnosed with anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, dissociative disorders, substance use disorder, HIV/AIDS, chronic illness, IDDs, neurodivergence. LGBTQIA individuals, immigrants, undocumented individuals, survivors of medical system trauma, housing insecurity, ACEs, and SDOH inequities.

Individuals diagnosed with PTSD, depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, dissociative disorders, HIV/AIDS, chronic illness, IDDs, neurodivergence. LGBTQIA individuals, immigrants, undocumented individuals, survivors of medical system trauma, ACEs, SDOH inequities.

name: Neroli (Citrus aurantium var. amara)
description: Floral-citrus scent, uplifting yet gentle; helps reduce trauma-related hypervigilance.
supports: Survivors of systemic trauma, racism, identity trauma, sexual assault, trafficking, domestic abuse, incarceration, foster care. Individuals diagnosed with PTSD, anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder, dissociative disorders, substance use disorder, HIV/AIDS, chronic illness, IDDs, neurodivergence, schizophrenia.
